page.title: 06LEISURE FACILITIES IN HANLEY
page.content: There are a variety of places of entertainment in Hanley town centre eg a theatre, two cinemas and discos.One disco has an 11+ club and inside it is like three living-rooms put together with two dance floors and two bars.The club opens at 6 pm until 8.30 pm.The disc-jockey there plays the 'Top 40'. Northwood stadium is on the outskirts of Hanley, near to Bucknall.The interior of the stadium consists of three squash courts, four badminton courts and visitors can play basketball,table-tennis,volley-ball and 5-a-side football,while for strong people there is weight training. Recently there has been a new international sports track constructed to encourage international events.We hope there will be competitions and records will be broken.Spectator stands are now under construction.
